task: Calculate the number of detected genes (genes with at least 1 count) for each on-tissue bead in this Seeker dataset. Report summary statistics. Return a JSON object with fields: on_tissue_cells (total number of on-tissue cells), mean_genes_per_cell (mean number of genes detected per cell), median_genes_per_cell (median number of genes detected per cell), std_genes_per_cell (standard deviation of genes per cell).
